column5: Elegant, contemporary townhome conveniently located minutes from downtown & major attractions. With over 2,100 square feet, you and your family/friends will have plenty of space to feel right at home. You will have access to the private gated driveway that can fit 3 cars if needed. At sunset or sunrise, check out the fourth floor balcony. The neighborhood is rich with local culture from surrounding cafes, restaurants, bars, and art studios. The house is clean, spacious, and secure.
column8: Brand New Modern Townhouse Near DT w/ Parking
